Tucson nodds to Guardia.

"Yes, the Autobots.  My brothers and comrades.  I=
f I could just get a hold of any of them, they would be more than willing t=
o help us against Unicron.  They bare the same symbol as I do. "

He shows =
them his Autobot faction symbol on his left arm.

" Also, maybe it wouldn't=
 be such a bad idea if we could get a message to the Decepticons.."
